changes: Replaced 'fmt.Printf("Error: %v\n", err)' with 'werrors.Display(err)' in two error handling blocks

patterns_discovered: Custom error handling with Display() method
Error type abstraction through custom errors package
gotchas_discovered: Previously using generic '%v' formatting for errors
Lack of specialized error display before this change

approach_outcome.description: Replaced generic error printing with custom errors.Display() method

recommendations: Consider adding logging alongside Display() for traceability
Review all error handling points to ensure consistent use of Display()
Create comprehensive test cases for different error types
